languages.text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}explosive damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

languages.text:
当受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此生物会启动自毁程序，在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时爆炸。若此生物在自毁过程中死亡，也同样会引发爆炸。
爆炸会对4格内所有生物造成<u>24-39</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}冲击伤害{/g}，爆炸攻击拥有10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}。
languages.original_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当受到伤害时，此生物会启动自毁程序，在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时爆炸。若此生物在自毁过程中死亡，也同样会引发爆炸。

languages.text:
Получив {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, существо активирует самоуничтожение и взрывается в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Если убить существо раньше, чем процесс самоуничтожения завершится, также произойдет взрыв.
Взрыв имеет радиус в 4 клетки и наносит <u>(от 24 до 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}ударного урона{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} составляет 10%.
languages.original_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates a self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}explosive damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Получив урон, существо активирует самоуничтожение и взрывается в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Если убить существо раньше, чем процесс самоуничтожения завершится, также произойдет взрыв.

Получив урон, существо активирует самоуничтожение и взрывается в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Если убить существо раньше, чем процесс самоуничтожения завершится, также произойдет взрыв.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、この生物は自爆を発動して次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に爆発する。自爆発動中の生物を倒しても爆発は起こる。
この爆発は半径4マスに効果があり、10%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ<u>24～39</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}衝撃ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ダメージを受けた時、この生物は自爆を発動し、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で爆発する。自爆処理中の生物を殺しても爆発を起こす。

languages.text:
Al sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, esta criatura activa un sistema de autodestrucción y explota en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Matar a una criatura que se está autodestruyendo también causará una explosión.
La explosión tiene un radio de 4 casillas e inflige <u>(de 24 a 39)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}daño de impacto{/g} con 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al sufrid daño, esta criatura activa un sistema de autodestrucción y explota en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Matar a una criatura que se está autodestruyendo también causará una explosión.

languages.text:
Beim Erleiden von {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aktiviert diese Kreatur die Selbstzerstörung und explodiert bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Das Töten einer Kreatur im Selbstzerstörungsmodus verursacht ebenfalls eine Explosion.
Die Explosion wirkt in einem 4-Felder-Radius und fügt <u>(von 24 bis 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}Trefferschaden{/g} mit 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu.
languages.original_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Beim Erleiden von Schaden aktiviert diese Kreatur die Selbstzerstörung und explodiert bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Das Töten einer Kreatur im Selbstzerstörungsmodus verursacht ebenfalls eine Explosion.

languages.text: Lorsqu'elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, cette créature active sa fonction d'autodestruction et explose lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. L'élimination d'une créature en cours d'autodestruction provoque également une explosion. L'explosion a un rayon de 4 cases et inflige <u>(de 24 à 39)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}dégâts par impact{/g} avec 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When suffering {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, this creature activates self-destruct, exploding on its next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Killing a creature in the process of self-destruct will also cause an explosion.
The explosion has a 4-cell radius and deals <u>(from 24 to 39)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'elle subit des dégâts, cette créature active sa fonction d'autodestruction et explose lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. L'élimination d'une créature en cours d'autodestruction provoque également une explosion.
